channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large quantity of food waste, 14th March
item.description:
Gambles Lane, about 200m from the top. It looks like it might have been a rather tasty paella at some point and a catering-sized amount at that. It takes a special kind of effort to transport this in a container and dump it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gambles Lane, Woodmancote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 potholes on Albany Road, 14th March
item.description:
Here we have a series of three potholes in front on 33 & 35 Albany Road. They are in the middle of the road and are continually growing due to traffic always hitting them.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Albany Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple street lights out by park and pathways., 14th March
item.description:
Lobleys Drive Skate Park, near Sycamore Walk Brockworth, (post code: GL3 4GD). Whole field area around sports pitches has zero lighting endangering people when dark.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Excessive number of car learner schools, 14th March
item.description:
Up to 30 learner cars every day using road for parking and driving practice - causing safety risk and traffic pollution
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chosen Way, Hucclecote, Gloucester

item.title: Multiple blocked drains, 14th March
item.description:
Outside Busy Bees nursery water is still running down the road even though there'd hadn't been rain for many hours because the drain are full to the brim of water. There's at least three backed up drains before the water is able enter one further down
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 218, Prestbury Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain still not cleared, 14th March
item.description:
Huge puddle still forming each time it rains
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 178;178a, Prestbury Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drainage issues on new cycle path, 14th March
item.description:
Any ideas about the designation of the route as this affects whether powered wheelchairs are permitted to use it?! class2 chairs (max speed4mph) are only permitted on the road if there is no footpath but they are prohibited from routes that are designated cycles only!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cleeve Road, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 14th March
item.description:

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 14th March
item.description:
Take up and relay 9 x 6,5 crossing kerb stat required with road Closure required with access only (FW Kerbing Defects)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 14th March
item.description:
Take up and relay 2x 6,5 crossing kerb stat required with give and take tm and no parking cones (FW Kerbing Defects)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic lights on Hucclecote Road/Carisbrooke Road/Churchdown Lane still causing big tailbacks along Hucclecote Road due to change in phasing of lights, 14th March
item.description:
As a result of the change to the phasing of the lights at this junction there are long delays being created along Hucclecote Road at most times. This has be reported previously but is still an ongoing issue. Please could the phasing be returned to previous timings to optimise traffic flow from all directions
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Carisbrooke Road, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.description:
As a result of the change to the phasing of the lights at this junction there are long delays being created along Hucclecote Road at most times. This has be reported previously but is still an ongoing issue. Please could the phasing be returned to previous timings to optimise traffic flow from all directions
